text: Ndipo iwo akaona katundu wa malonda kapena zinthu zina zosangalatsa, iwo amazithamangira izo ndi kukusiya wekha uli chiimire pa mapamphero. Nena: “Zimene Mulungu ali nazo ndi zabwino kwambiri kuposa katundu wina aliyense wamalonda kapena chisangalalo.” Mulungu ndiye amene amapereka moolowa manja
